name: Verify user can be updated successfully

steps.name: Given the API client is initialized for TC_02 First Scenario
When I send a PUT request to update a user
Then the response status should be 200 for TC_02 First Scenario
And the response data should be updated with the correct name
And the response should match the updated schema
And the response time should be less than 2 seconds

fullName: Update User Endpoint: Verify user can be updated successfully
